attributes.action: Increase the exposure of women's football on TV, radio and in the media.
attributes.background:
More 4 Women's Football is a campaign that aims to help increase the exposure of the women's game. Publicity will help inspire young women and improve the game at all levels. 

Our aim is to get broadcasters to give more attention to the women's game and therefore create more female role models.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to increase coverage of women's football.
